description.zh-cn: 中国新闻工作者，现任中华全国新闻工作者协会党组书记、副主席，曾任新华通讯社副社长、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese journalist, current Party Group Secretary and Vice Chairman of the All-China Journalists Association, and former Vice President and Party Group member of Xinhua News Agency.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社，法定新闻监管机构。
description.en: The state news agency of the People's Republic of China and a statutory news regulation body.

nodes.id: 中华全国新闻工作者协会

zh-cn: 中华全国新闻工作者协会

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党领导的、中国新闻界唯一的全国性人民团体。
description.en: The sole national people's organization in the Chinese journalism industry, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国新闻工作者协会党组书记。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Party Group Secretary of the All-China Journalists Association.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Hefei, Anhui province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所新闻专业高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education for journalism in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据中国政府网2022年7月8日发布的国务院任免国家工作人员通知，刘思扬被免去新华通讯社副社长职务。
description.en: According to the State Council's notice on appointments and removals of state staff issued on the official website of the Chinese government on July 8, 2022, Liu Siyang was removed from the position of Vice President of Xinhua News Agency.

relationships.target: 中华全国新闻工作者协会

description.zh-cn: 刘思扬接替刘正荣出任中华全国新闻工作者协会党组书记。
description.en: Liu Siyang succeeded Liu Zhengrong as the Party Group Secretary of the All-China Journalists Association.
